Package hu.klenium.tetris.view

Class BoardCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.klenium.tetris.view.BoardCell
  • public class BoardCell
extends java.lang.Object
    Board cells might store one part of a fallen tetromino.
    Empty cells doesn't have view in this version, hence this class implements the optional object pattern.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int posX  
      private int posY  
      private SquareView view
      View of this board cell.

    • Field Detail

      • posX

        private final int posX

      • posY

        private final int posY

      • view

        private SquareView view
        View of this board cell. When a tetromino falls down, its parts are copied to the board. The view is empty (null) if a tetromino hasn't fallen onto this cell, otherwise it stores the tetromino part's view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardCell

        public BoardCell​(int posX,
                 int posY)
        Parameters:
        posX - X coordinate (from the board's left side).
        posY - Y coordinate (from the board's top side).

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the cell (so it will be empty).

      • getView

        public SquareView getView()

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        False, if this cell contains a tetromino part (has a view), true if it's unused.

      • setView

        public void setView​(SquareView view)

      • update

        public void update​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext context,
                   int size)
        If the cell is used, displays its view.
        Parameters:
        context - The context used by the view to draw.
        size - Size of the cell.
